name: Embrace (MJ112)
description:
Embrace

The world is gradually falling apart in an ocean of negative emotions.

Can you find all the scattered friends in the world and warm them up with the world's original greeting: a hug? Find everyone and successfully walk through all the pieces will get a surprise!

⭐⭐⭐
